content: Greetings. As the representative of Yellow, I wish for open dialogue and understanding between all nations. Cooperation is the surest path to shared security and prosperity.
Yellow reaffirms its commitment to open communication and good-faith cooperation between all nations.
Pink, as a fellow democracy seeking recognition and prosperity, you have Yellow's friendship. How may we deepen our trade partnership and cooperation on issues of mutual concern?
Green, as an advocate for regional unity and balanced global diplomacy, your wisdom would benefit all. How can Yellow support your efforts to foster cooperation over division?
Yellow reiterates its commitment to open communication between all nations and calls for continued cultural and educational exchanges to foster understanding. Cooperation is the surest path.
